68a9b6c8d3a061d8b6058346 Name: Galvion Caiman Hybrid Ballistic Mandible Guard (MultiCam)
68a9b6c8d3a061d8b6058346 Description: A special additional ballistic protection for the Caiman Hybrid helmet, mounted on the side rails. Manufactured by Galvion. MultiCam camouflage version.
68a9b73bd3a061d8b6058348 Name: Galvion Caiman Hybrid Ballistic Mandible Guard (Mutualist)
68a9b73bd3a061d8b6058348 Description: A special additional ballistic protection for the Caiman Hybrid helmet, mounted on the side rails. Manufactured by Galvion. Painted with an intimidating print.
68a9b821cdf661cc5a0626c6 Description: The "Death Shadow" mask for face protection, reinforced with aramid fibers. Only airsofters would find this mask cool. Gold version.
68a9b852cdf661cc5a0626c9 Description: The "Death Shadow" mask for face protection, reinforced with aramid fibers. Only airsofters would find this mask cool. Gray version with orange lenses.
68a9b873a4b28d56c80a1818 Description: The "Death Shadow" mask for face protection, reinforced with aramid fibers. Only airsofters would find this mask cool. White version.
68a9be93f260f4e1c2038686 Name: Diamond Age NeoSteel High Cut helmet (Orange Stains)
68a9be93f260f4e1c2038686 Description: The Diamond Age NeoSteel helmet features a unique design that combines high-strength steel with composite materials to provide advanced protection against ballistic and impact threats. Painted with orange stripes to add some character.
68a9beecbba00932ed0bc256 Name: Diamond Age NeoSteel High Cut helmet (Aces)
68a9beecbba00932ed0bc256 Description: The Diamond Age NeoSteel helmet features a unique design that combines high-strength steel with composite materials to provide advanced protection against ballistic and impact threats. Comes with a lucky paint job.
68a9bf7d9f4c45817b0d83b6 Name: Diamond Age NeoSteel helmet ballistic mandible (Black)
68a9bf7d9f4c45817b0d83b6 Description: An extra ballistic protection for the Diamond Age NeoSteel helmet. Black version.
68a9c0ed6d47c49b700faaf9 Name: Diamond Age NeoSteel helmet ballistic mandible (Aces)
68a9c0ed6d47c49b700faaf9 Description: An extra ballistic protection for the Diamond Age NeoSteel helmet. Comes with a lucky paint job.
68aee763130c00663d08aea8 Description: The TKPD (Tyazhelyy Karabin Podderzhki Dragunova - "Dragunov Heavy Support Carbine") is a modernized SVDK chambered in 9.3x64mm, commissioned by PMC BEAR. The weapon is noted for high accuracy and effectively suppresses targets at medium ranges. Manufactured by SniperArms Dynamics.
68aee8f8130c00663d08aeb3 Description: A receiver top cover for the TKPD assault carbine. Equipped with a Picatinny rail for installation of optics.
68aee9731ef0d507780a61c9 Description: A handguard mounting trunnion for the TKPD assault carbine.
68aee9b89df2c1144f0aaa46 Description: A 457mm barrel for the TKPD 9.3x64mm assault carbine.
68aee9e31ef0d507780a61cd Description: A standard gas tube for the TKPD assault carbine.
68aee9fe130c00663d08aeb6 Description: A standard handguard for the TKPD assault carbine. Allows installation of tactical equipment and a bipod. Black version.
68aeeb3e9df2c1144f0aaa4b Description: A muzzle brake for the TKPD assault carbine.
68aeed8a8906b00bc800fdd6 Description: A 9.3x64mm Soft Point hunting cartridge loaded with a 17.4 gram semi-jacketed bullet. The bullet delivers increased stopping power at medium ranges and is intended for hunting large game, as it provides strong terminal performance and can cause severe incapacitating wounds on impact.
68aef9bf4efeccb5220d25c6 Description: A 10-round 9.3x64mm magazine for the TKPD assault carbine.
68b966e44b7f808d5609ac04 Description: A tactical chassis for the VPO-215 Gornostay hunting rifle.
68b97e7fd9dbc47f4808b09d Description: A front rail for the VPO-125 tactical chassis. Allows installation of tactical equipment.
68b98415032fa71d2a000dab Description: A 360mm barrel for VPO-215 rifle chambered in .366TKM.
68b985da5133d696f7032d37 Description: A tactical threading protection cap for the VPO-215 .366TKM rifle barrel.
68bac6ca653ee6b1e406d978 Description: A civilian 9.3x64mm Full Metal Jacket cartridge loaded with a 17.5 gram fully jacketed bullet. The full metal jacket reduces deformation on impact. This cartridge is most commonly used for sport shooting, training, and zeroing, and is sometimes used for hunting when minimal damage to game is desired.
68bad8376cb22acf1107a586 Description: A military 9.3x64mm 7N33 cartridge loaded with a 17.4 gram armor-piercing bullet with a steel core. The 7N33 delivers high penetration thanks to its steel core and substantial muzzle energy. Used by Russian special operations forces.
68badb6458dbe419740b1520 Description: A telescopic buttstock designed for installation on 1913 Picatinny rails. Manufactured by Magpul. Black version.
68badc0366a72211fe004bc7 Description: A cheek rest for the Universal Carbine Stock. Manufactured by Magpul.
68badf5030572e90770cd688 Description: A Weaver rail for the Mossberg 590 shotgun, installed on the receiver. Manufactured by Precision Reflex.
68bb25270e48a3afd7071216 Description: A quick-detach buttstock for AR-15/M16 carbines with a mil-spec telescoping tube, manufactured by Magpul Original Equipment. The frame design prevents binding and accidental release of the locking lever, while the standard-thickness rubber buttpad reduces slipping on armor or gear. Black version.
68bb2a3831ee03fbc00931e6 Description: A quick-detach buttstock for AR-15/M16 carbines with a mil-spec telescoping tube, manufactured by Magpul Original Equipment. The frame design prevents binding and accidental release of the locking lever, while the standard-thickness rubber buttpad reduces slipping on armor or gear. Flat Dark Earth version.
68be93d19bae3db9c5005b19 Description: A 570mm barrel for the TKPD 9.3x64mm assault carbine.
68bedc0365e7dcf94f0cb0fc Description: The Advanced Target Pointer Illuminator Aiming Laser (ATPIAL) produced by L3 Technologies is a rugged, combat-proven and easy-to-use aiming system with integrated infrared and visible aim lasers as well as an infrared illuminator. Black version.
68bedd86191bb52a5605af8e Description: Mirror glasses with green lenses. Nature.
68bede1d233f2c935b0eda02 Description: Blue shutter glasses for the true 2010 partygoers. Sucks that you can't see anything with them on.
68bede2876e02b9e340ef10f Description: Green shutter glasses for the true 2010 partygoers. Sucks that you can't see anything with them on.
68bede2fd6da72c13f03db91 Description: Red shutter glasses for the true 2010 partygoers. Sucks that you can't see anything with them on.
68bede355f1439bc3c0bf814 Description: White shutter glasses for the true 2010 partygoers. Sucks that you can't see anything with them on.
68bede896b0736bebc012ad7 Description: A classic 2010 internet meme brought to life in eyewear form. Throw these on and never remove them after.
68beded9233f2c935b0eda04 Description: Limited edition sunglasses. People used to camp in lines for those, but you got them easy.
68bedee076e02b9e340ef111 Description: Limited edition sunglasses with green lenses. People used to camp in lines for those, but you got them easy.
68bedeedd6da72c13f03db93 Description: Limited edition sunglasses with red lenses. People used to camp in lines for those, but you got them easy.
68bedfa56b0736bebc012ad9 Description: They say this mustache is enough to become the truest legend of the ring.
68bedfdd233f2c935b0eda06 Description: A mustache for the real hussars. Or barbershop goers.
68bee0ee79c8186398098e6b Description: A training mask in a black color.
68bee0fac89ccaee060c81d4 Description: A training mask in a green color.
68bee1066b0736bebc012adb Description: A training mask in a gray color.
68bee20bede5c8489f08e1b1 Description: A training mask with a sharky smile.
68bee21213febe37b20e7e11 Description: A training mask with some bright elements.
68bee22e79c8186398098e6d Description: A Japanese style mask by DevTac.
68bee238a48c3c320808abc4 Description: A Japanese style mask by DevTac. Gold color version.
68bee23f6b0736bebc012add Description: A Japanese style mask by DevTac. Purple version.
68bee246ede5c8489f08e1b3 Description: A Japanese style mask by DevTac. White version.
68bee28f79c8186398098e6f Description: A painted helmet. Part of the Champion set.
68bee2b431902bb4d90c3a2a Description: A tactical load-bearing system designed to carry magazines, grenades, and special equipment, while using low-profile body armor. Manufactured by London Bridge Trading. AOR1 version for the true Seals.
68bee2ccd6da72c13f03db95 Description: A combat helmet with the ears and back of the head protection, manufactured by HighCom. Spray painted in a desert-style camouflage.
68bee2d9af253218c00ebbb4 Name: HighCom Striker ULACH IIIA helmet (Green Stripes)
68bee2d9af253218c00ebbb4 Description: A combat helmet with the ears and back of the head protection, manufactured by HighCom. Spray painted in a green camouflage.
68bee2e0ede5c8489f08e1b5 Name: HighCom Striker ULACH IIIA helmet (Mesh Spray)
68bee2e0ede5c8489f08e1b5 Description: A combat helmet with the ears and back of the head protection, manufactured by HighCom. Spray painted with a mesh pattern for better camouflage.
68bee2e876e02b9e340ef113 Name: HighCom Striker ULACH IIIA helmet (Coyote Stripes)
68bee2e876e02b9e340ef113 Description: A combat helmet with the ears and back of the head protection, manufactured by HighCom. Spray painted in coyote color for better camouflage.
68beef31a3433485d30d5ae1 Description: A quality balaclava with a special technological material. For the fans of horror movies and orange cats.
68beef6ca3433485d30d5ae3 Description: A quality balaclava with a special technological material. Made for perfect pictures.
68bf405779c8186398099017 Description: A special in-ear headset for communication and hearing protection. Manufactured by 3M Peltor. Coyote Brown version.
68c14b734a7e0bada00f8fd4 Name: Reprogrammed keycard for A.P.'s apartment lock (Green)
68c14b734a7e0bada00f8fd4 Description: A green TerraGroup Labs keycard reprogrammed using technical data from A.P.'s flash drive. In theory it might open a hidden room in A.P.'s apartment.
68c15a033173b556890b5959 Description: A 7.62x25mm TT cartridge fitted with a Western 4 gram M855A1 armor-piercing bullet. Neat.
68c15b4bb30038a118088bd6 Description: A 7.62x25mm TT cartridge fitted with a Western 3.6 gram M856A1 armor-piercing tracer bullet. Tracer color: Red.
68c15f77ed3d7df9220debd6 Description: A 7.62x25mm TT cartridge fitted with a Western 3.4 gram M995 armor-piercing bullet. Neat.
68c165f1903341d88b092b2a Description: A key to an apartment in a luxury residential complex. These apartments once housed TerraGroup's senior executives.
68c16b9ab6b75a8a480520a6 Description: A Russian assault rifle that combines the ergonomics of the AR-15 platform with the widely available 5.45x39mm cartridge. Manufactured by Custom Guns. This variant uses a bolt carrier group in a direct gas impingement configuration.
68c16e84fc90c174e50de1a8 Description: An upper receiver for the direct impingement NL545 assault rifle manufactured by Custom Guns. Equipped with a mount for attaching additional devices.
68c16edf83e2d814b0093f76 Description: A 16.3 inch (415mm) 5.45x39mm barrel for the direct impingement NL545 assault rifle manufactured by Custom Guns.
68c16f15efac701f800dfd36 Description: A standard charging handle for NL545 series carbines and assault rifles. Manufactured by Custom Guns.
68c16f6883e2d814b0093f7a Name: AR-15 SLR Rifleworks Sentry 7 gas block
68c16f6883e2d814b0093f7a Description: A low-profile gas block that replaces the factory gas tube collar on AR-10/AR-15 family carbines and rifles. Manufactured by SLR Rifleworks.
68c16fcffc90c174e50de1ae Name: AR-15 DLG Tactical DLG-138 pistol grip (Black)
68c16fcffc90c174e50de1ae Description: The DLG-138 pistol grip can be installed on any weapon compatible with AR-15 systems. Manufactured by DLG Tactical. Black version.
68c16fe183e2d814b0093f7c Name: AR-15 DLG Tactical DLG-138 pistol grip (FDE)
68c16fe183e2d814b0093f7c Description: The DLG-138 pistol grip can be installed on any weapon compatible with AR-15 systems. Manufactured by DLG Tactical. Flat Dark Earth version.
68c17005ba442c8112076088 Description: An AR-15 mil-spec buffer tube for installation of various telescopic buttstocks. Manufactured by Custom Guns.
68c1701cba442c811207608b Description: An AR-15 mil-spec buffer tube for installation of various telescopic buttstocks. Manufactured by Custom Guns. Flat Dark Earth version.
68c1707983e2d814b0093f7e Name: AR-15 Custom Guns 10.5 inch M-LOK handguard
68c1707983e2d814b0093f7e Description: The Custom Guns 10.5 inch handguard for AR-15 equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional devices and accessories.
68c170e383e2d814b0093f87 Name: AR-15 Custom Guns 14 inch M-LOK handguard
68c170e383e2d814b0093f87 Description: The Custom Guns 14 inch handguard for AR-15 equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional devices and accessories.
68c2940aecc41cc5490bd40e Description: A Russian assault rifle that combines the ergonomics of the AR-15 platform with the widely available 5.45x39mm cartridge. Manufactured by Custom Guns. This variant uses a bolt carrier group in a short-stroke gas piston configuration.
68c294360f5ebd68290d6c16 Description: An upper receiver for the short-stroke gas piston NL545 assault rifle manufactured by Custom Guns. Equipped with a mount for attaching additional devices. Flat Dark Earth version.
68c294750f5ebd68290d6c1c Description: A 16.5 inch (420mm) 5.45x39mm barrel for the short-stroke gas piston NL545 assault rifle manufactured by Custom Guns.
68c294800f5ebd68290d6c20 Description: A 11.5 inch (292mm) 5.45x39mm barrel for the short-stroke gas piston NL545 assault rifle manufactured by Custom Guns.
68c294b9eb59c46bf6070536 Description: The Dragon muzzle brake by Lantac is designed for installation on 5.56x45mm weapon systems. Reduces recoil and counters the muzzle climb.
68c2989dc9061bb2f50478f6 Description: The Custom Guns 10.5 inch handguard for NL545 equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional devices and accessories. Flat Dark Earth version.
68c2a99647eb77c6310b170f Description: An adjustable gas block designed for NL545 series carbines and assault rifles. Manufactured by Custom Guns.
68c721ef980898142c0b3c5a Description: This pass for Station 14-4 KORD is issued to K. Arshavin. It appears to have lain unprotected for a long time and may be damaged.
68c725b516027530a50f0d4b Description: A flash drive containing data recorded in the ARRS station server room. It's best to return it to Mechanic.
68c944200bf756126e00d801 Description: A trophy for participating in Season 1 of the BattlePass. Rumor has it that it’s made up of items personally selected by Ref. Designed for true gladiators and can only be opened within the Arena.
68c954d8ecbf3abc9907ee9b Description: A trophy for participating in Season 1 of the BattlePass. Another crate assembled by Ref, filled with various gear to help endure the hardships of life in Tarkov. Can only be opened in the Arena, under Ref’s watchful eye.
68caaa93269e10396503acf6 Name: AR-15 5.56x45 Centurion Arms Mk12 18 inch barrel
68caaa93269e10396503acf6 Description: An 18 inch (457mm) barrel for AR-15 platform weapons for 5.56x45 NATO ammo. Manufactured by Centurion Arms.
68caabc3f42a4476cf0be2a6 Name: AR-15 5.56x45 Centurion Arms Mk12 16 inch barrel
68caabc3f42a4476cf0be2a6 Description: A 16 inch (406mm) barrel for AR-15 platform weapons for 5.56x45 NATO ammo. Manufactured by Centurion Arms.
68caabebc71156cf470bc186 Name: AR-15 Precision Reflex M84 Gas Buster Charging Handle
68caabebc71156cf470bc186 Description: The M84 Gas Buster charging handle for use with AR-15 platform rifles, equipped with the Military Big Latch. Manufactured by Precision Reflex.
68caac02269e10396503acfa Name: AR-15 Precision Reflex Mk12 Gen.1 Flip-Up Front Sight Gas Block
68caac02269e10396503acfa Description: A gas block with an integrated foldable front sight for the AR-15 platform. Manufactured by Precision Reflex.
68caac14f42a4476cf0be2aa Name: AR-15 Sierra Precision SPR pistol grip
68caac14f42a4476cf0be2aa Description: The polymer SPR Handgrip can be installed on any weapon compatible with AR-15 pistol grips. Manufactured by Sierra Precision.
68caac28f42a4476cf0be2ac Name: AR-15 Precision Reflex GEN III Round Carbon 12 inch handguard
68caac28f42a4476cf0be2ac Description: The 12 inch GEN III Round Carbon handguard for AR-15 systems. Manufactured by Precision Reflex.
68caac360bfe742288085e16 Name: AR-15 KAC Free Float Rifle RAS 12 inch handguard
68caac360bfe742288085e16 Description: A quad-rail 12 inch handguard for the AR-15 platform. Manufactured by Knight's Armament Company.
68caac500bfe742288085e1e Description: The SPR muzzle brake for the AR-15 platform. Manufactured by Allen Engineering.
68caac63269e10396503acfc Name: Allen Engineering SPR Brake thread protector
68caac63269e10396503acfc Description: A thread protector for the SPR Brake, manufactured by Allen Engineering.
68caac96933990601c07f476 Name: AR-15 Allen Engineering SPR Collar suppressor mount
68caac96933990601c07f476 Description: A special AR-15 barrel mount required for installation of Allen Engineering suppressors. Manufactured by Allen Engineering.
68caacb4c8ac87b10507c5a6 Name: AR-15 Precision Reflex GEN III SPR Top Rail
68caacb4c8ac87b10507c5a6 Description: A rifle length Picatinny top rail designed for installation on Precision Reflex GEN III Round handguards. Bridges the handguard and upper receiver. Manufactured by Precision Reflex.
68caacc7933990601c07f479 Description: A.R.M.S. #22 is a universal 30mm scope base mount for installation on Picatinny rails.
68caace5f42a4476cf0be2b4 Description: A top ring cap for the A.R.M.S. #22 mount.
68caacf7c8ac87b10507c5a9 Description: A universal rail mount for installation of various red dot sights or tactical equipment on the A.R.M.S. #22 optic mount, installed as replacement for standard ring cap.
68caad12269e10396503acfe Description: The Allen Engineering AEM-5 5.56x45/.223 sound suppressor. Can only be installed on compatible Allen Engineering muzzle devices, and also requires a proprietary SPR Collar on the barrel.
68caad70269e10396503ad00 Description: A flip-up rear sight manufactured by A.R.M.S. Inc.
68caad7f933990601c07f47c Description: Precise, accurate, durable and dependable - the Mark 4 MR/T TS-30A2 rifle scope. The model provides 2.5-8x magnification giving you a clear idea of the actual size of the targeted object.
68cc09872bdcc15c010c2668 Description: This restored pass should now be able to unlock Station 14-4 KORD.
68cc2ae66e59cb54f4054f47 Name: AR-15 Precision Reflex GEN III Round Carbon 12 inch handguard (FDE)
68cc2ae66e59cb54f4054f47 Description: The 12 inch GEN III Round Carbon handguard for AR-15 systems. Manufactured by Precision Reflex. Flat Dark Earth version.
68d152b9915f131d4e05ee6c Description: An old voice recorder that, apparently, was used by Voevoda himself.
68d159d46c606e46b605094d Description: A mounting system designed to install the N-15 series night vision goggles to Dovetail type helmet mounts. Manufactured by Armasight.
68d16e9f2711340d6b0d4786 Name: Miller Bros. Blades M-2 Tactical Sword (Brown)
68d16e9f2711340d6b0d4786 Description: The "M-2" short tactical sword, manufactured by Miller Bros. Blades. Brown vesion.
68d271fc17de6a40270d5657 Description: A personal phone belonging to one of the Bogatyr squad members. Some data may still remain on it.
68d2f09fb350a6169f04bea9 Description: A threatening note left on the door.
68d2f1318c12620073059930 Description: A crumpled note stained with machine oil.
68d2f302be7c1493b90cd3f5 Description: A note from a certain Nagano'98.
68d2f3375f98276b7503c32e Description: A note from Reshala's crew mentioning Kozlov's address.
68d2f400be7c1493b90cd3f7 Description: An issue featuring a story about the unexpected PMC rescue.
68d2f44df63f06b7590ce30e Description: An issue featuring a story about the mysterious Mushroom Picker.
68d2f4aff8817df4690db3d1 Description: A postal envelope without a letter, taken from a courier and unsealed immediately.
68d2f4fc17b59ead010894b6 Description: A letter taken from courier Pasha by Reshala’s people.
68d2f56eb350a6169f04beab Name: Newspaper clipping with a photo of Anastasia
68d2f56eb350a6169f04beab Description: It seems Kozlov left a message on the back of the photograph.
68d2f6352ca1a737d107b84b Name: Tarkov Herald newspaper with article by A. Mikhailova
68d2f6352ca1a737d107b84b Description: This issue features an article on the preparation of an important investigation by the journalist A. Mikhailova.
68d2f69e91c2fa84e2044a08 Description: Someone tore a note containing a number or code. Without the other half, it’s useless.
68d2f6dbf8817df4690db3d3 Description: The second half of the note contains only two digits. It seems to be a radio frequency or some kind of code.
68d2f7334aae290cf704e36d Name: BEAR note from the outpost behind Ultra
68d2f7334aae290cf704e36d Description: Someone left their notes at the Gnezdo outpost.
68d2f77e5f98276b7503c330 Description: One of the BEARs in the Gnezdo camp clearly tried to triangulate Bogatyr squad's signal. According to the map, the signal came from the eastern part of the nature reserve.
68d2f9164aae290cf704e36f Name: Voevoda's photo with a cultist mark
68d2f9164aae290cf704e36f Description: Someone circled Voevoda with a marker and left instructions for the cultists on the back.
68d2f96e0c834c20c00a81d8 Description: The note mentions Yastreb and preparations for the ambush on the Bogatyr squad. It seems Prapor was somehow involved in the operation.
68d2f9bd2ca1a737d107b84d Description: This cultists' note mentions the General, as well as the Lighthouse Warden.
68d2fa018c12620073059932 Description: A note containing an order from a commander known as Leshy.
68d2fa3abe7c1493b90cd3f9 Description: The note mentions experiments on central nervous system stability, conducted on human subjects.
68d2fa6d4aae290cf704e371 Description: According to the note, the test subjects were deliberately driven to psychosis.
68d2fa9b691b7c7b34046367 Description: The note describes experiments aimed at altering the test subjects' biological clocks.
68d2fac7c8305ec7c900296c Name: Assistant's notes on Group #3 and Group #10
68d2fac7c8305ec7c900296c Description: It seems that during the experiments in The Labyrinth, TerraGroup couldn’t dispose of the test subjects’ bodies fast enough.
68d2faf191c2fa84e2044a0b Name: Assistant's notes on TG-Vi-24 test subjects
68d2faf191c2fa84e2044a0b Description: A note in which the lab assistant reports on the condition of the test subjects involved in project TG-Vi-24.
68d2fc914aae290cf704e373 Description: A letter from Kozlov that has been sitting in the mailbox.
68d2fd018c12620073059934 Description: A letter from Kozlov's room that he never managed to send.
68d2fd582ca1a737d107b84f Description: Notes from Leshy, detailing his mapping of The Labyrinth and reports on events following the assault.
68d2fdbbf8817df4690db3d5 Description: Voronenko's report details the experiments TerraGroup conducted on humans in The Labyrinth.
68d301e75f98276b7503c332 Description: The report details FSB monitoring of Chepyga. Someone added a handwritten note to it.
68d302814aae290cf704e375 Description: The documents describe several operations carried out by the Bogatyr squad.
68d3037c91c2fa84e2044a0d Description: The report details how Voevoda conducted the hostage rescue operation at the Tarbank branch.
68d3041818d70f97e704ad7b Description: The report from The Unheard states that their agents have already infiltrated government structures in multiple countries and hold influence beyond Russia.
68d3054f0c834c20c00a81da Description: The file notes Moreman’s service locations and personality traits.
68d3059318d70f97e704ad7f Description: According to the file, Voevoda has a very impressive service record.
68d305c35f98276b7503c336 Description: The file shows that Taran is younger than the other members of the squad, but still has considerable combat experience.
68d305fc8c12620073059936 Description: It seems Strelets possessed exceptional shooting skills, which is why he didn’t change his specialty despite his age.
68d41e65a706eba9a204ed27 Description: The owner of this armband never uncovered the true reasons behind Tarkov’s disaster. But he survived, and in the end that was all that mattered.
68d41f017cb8c03da8079004 Description: Those who wear this armband once agreed to a compromise that came at far too high a cost.
68d41fb0a1c275dbaa0798bf Description: This armband marks the PMC operatives who could never break free from their Tarkov past.
68d41fde2937f3f17c04864d Description: This armband is worn only by PMCs who managed to uncover the truth in Tarkov’s brutal conditions.
68d54d0525ac8590a8075ac3 Name: Atomic Defense CQCM ballistic mask (Loui Peeton)
68d54d0525ac8590a8075ac3 Description: Atomic Defense's CQCM ballistic mask provides protection against short-range weapons including pistols, shotguns and knives. Comes with a luxury white print.
68d55968ca9935b3f10607a9 Description: A fanny pack made in collaboration with the Loui Peeton fashion house.
68d56685f3d7cd248f0a06d9 Description: A quick-detach sound suppressor for the AK-308 assault rifle, installed on the standard muzzle brake.
68d566b2aa07af2e14059e01 Name: AK-74 5.45x39 Magpul PMAG 30 GEN M3 30-round magazine (FDE)
68d566b2aa07af2e14059e01 Description: A 30-round polymer Magpul Pmag 30 AK74 GEN M3 magazine for 5.45x39 AK and compatible weapons. Flat dark Earth variant.
68d566f3f3d7cd248f0a06db Description: A telescopic buttstock designed for installation on 1913 Picatinny rails. Manufactured by Magpul. Flat Dark Earth version.
68d5674bb2573b07dc0d225f Description: The RK-3 Klassika anatomic pistol grip features a built-in hermetically sealed battery storage compartment and is designed for installation as a replacement for the standard AK pistol grip. ©Zenit. Flat Dark Earth version.
68d5676f43adc7372a0c8ae0 Description: A standard handguard for the TKPD assault carbine. Allows installation of tactical equipment and a bipod. Flat Dark Earth version.
68d65766916a108d7a023c98 Description: An armband for those who want to show their worth.
68d6b3568f9527c33609ce83 Description: Black shutter glasses for the true 2010 partygoers. Sucks that you can't see anything with them on.
68da4fa81ddecb1cc0077aee Description: A dogtag belonging to the Bogatyr squad member who has seen hundreds of battles.
68da4fe6f0e86677fe06bfe4 Description: Someone fashioned a talisman from a crumpled bullet, either as a keepsake or for luck.
68da51d8f0e86677fe06c9b7 Description: On the back of the postcard, someone wrote: "Love you, waiting for you".
68daab6d1e0a6a3f2f0db279 Description: A baseball cap with a patch to show everyone your favorite title.
68dbc04cd700686fbf0d77bd Description: A patch of some special BEAR unit.
68deaddfd149b3493e049c13 Description: A baseball cap with a patch to show everyone your favorite title.
68df97725d4e135b130392c8 Description: A poster showing a PMC who found his way out of Tarkov. He stayed clear of TerraGroup’s affairs and the roots of the conflict, yet still managed to survive and escape.
68df97792e6cd294e908d1e9 Name: To Fall in the Darkness poster
68df97792e6cd294e908d1e9 Description: A poster proving that for those who gave in to temptation, there’s only one path left — into the abyss.
68df977e972cf1e1ec072568 Description: A poster with a lighthouse. Under different circumstances it could have been a symbol of light. Here, it only serves as a reminder of an unpaid debt to a man you can never hide from.
68df9785beba86572e097ce8 Description: A poster showing that even the cruelest evil meets its end when it faces a worthy adversary. And on the ruins, humanity will build a new future.
68df9908972cf1e1ec07256a Description: An army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. Its owner never sought the reasons behind the conflict, but still managed to survive and escape Tarkov against all odds.
68df991142e96f583d042b8a Description: An army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. Stained with the blood of its owner, who fell into darkness chasing an easy way out of Tarkov.
68df991dbeba86572e097ceb Description: An army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. This one carries a bullet hole straight through the center and a scratched-in strand of barbed wire. Even if its owner escaped Tarkov, he couldn’t escape from himself.
68df9927a38a5e37d80df6c9 Description: An army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. Its owner shed light on all of TerraGroup’s secrets in Tarkov. The engraving on the tag symbolizes the inevitable downfall of the ruthless corporation.
68df99975d4e135b130392ca Description: An army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. Its owner never sought the reasons behind the conflict, but still managed to survive and escape Tarkov against all odds.
68df99a614ca2428b2017cd8 Description: An army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. Stained with the blood of its owner, who fell into darkness chasing an easy way out of Tarkov.
68df99b2f716906506098308 Description: An army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. This one carries a bullet hole straight through the center and a scratched-in strand of barbed wire. Even if its owner escaped Tarkov, he couldn’t escape from himself.
68df99c05d4e135b130392cc Description: An army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. Its owner shed light on all of TerraGroup’s secrets in Tarkov. The engraving on the tag symbolizes the inevitable downfall of the ruthless corporation.
68df9a053772634bf40f4f18 Description: The floor is made of durable materials requiring little upkeep. Just right when survival is the only priority.
68df9a14972cf1e1ec07256c Description: This floor hasn’t been cared for in years. No point trying to restore its original look.
68df9a222e6cd294e908d1eb Description: This floor bears plenty of footprints. But tidying up is pointless — today or tomorrow you’ll have to relocate when the next contract comes in.
68df9a2d3772634bf40f4f1a Description: Judging by the floor, someone keeps this place clean and in order. It feels like somewhere you’d want to come back to.
68df9a925d4e135b130392ce Description: This ceiling doesn’t leak or crumble. A pragmatic choice for those focused on survival.
68df9a9ba38a5e37d80df6cb Description: The ceiling shows plenty of water damage from leaks above. Still, it’s the least of a PMC’s problems once he’s slipped into darkness.
68df9aa45d4e135b130392d0 Description: The ceiling looks decent. Most of the plaster is intact and no major damage is visible. Good enough for a mercenary’s temporary shelter.
68df9aaf637781242a0b22fa Description: Someone leveled the ceiling and refreshed the plaster. Few places left in Tarkov could feel as cozy as this.
68df9abc5d4e135b130392d2 Description: The material for these walls was scavenged somewhere in Tarkov’s back alleys. Some blocks still carry traces of old street ads.
68df9ac5a38a5e37d80df6cd Description: Dirt and layers of old coatings left a unique pattern on these walls. They could use a good cleaning.
68df9b2642e96f583d042b8c Description: The walls are still covered in chipped and cracked Soviet-era paint. They could be fixed up, but no mercenary invests in a permanent home.
68df9b2e3772634bf40f4f1c Description: The walls are clearly painted with care, not at random. Someone tends to this place as if they still believe in a better ending and a peaceful future for Tarkov.
68dfafd82d57066c0d011c86 Description: An army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. Its owner never sought the reasons behind the conflict, but still managed to survive and escape Tarkov against all odds.
68dfafeadfaadbd4eb06539a Description: An army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. Stained with the blood of its owner, who fell into darkness chasing an easy way out of Tarkov.
68dfaffe3c5a40e30f0e55b0 Description: An army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. This one carries a bullet hole straight through the center and a scratched-in strand of barbed wire. Even if its owner escaped Tarkov, he couldn’t escape from himself.
68dfb00742e96f583d042bd2 Description: An army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. Its owner shed light on all of TerraGroup’s secrets in Tarkov. The engraving on the tag symbolizes the inevitable downfall of the ruthless corporation.
68dfc07da7cfeed3e60204e7 Description: A mysterious briefcase, apparently containing a certain "Ticket" out of Tarkov.
68e638cf85c63c556c0272db Description: A fragment of a device that apparently activated over Tarkov.
68e6394e658d876c930977b1 Description: A fragment of a device that apparently activated over Tarkov.
68e63a53371639e1e4004b6e Description: A device that establishes a remote, secure connection to databases and servers.
68e63b56ad8cba49190ea529 Description: A key for the Rus Post service vehicle. Most likely opens the trunk as well.
68e63d4794fb983cb7098d2d Description: A flyer that describes the aftermath of the EMP blast and includes official safety recommendations. Such flyers became a common sight across the city after the explosion.
68e63e8d94fb983cb7098d32 Description: A note left by one of the engineers in the workshop next to Item #1156.
68e7d1be6656898e78015bd9 Name: Decrypted Sliderkey flash drive marked with A.P.
68e7d1be6656898e78015bd9 Description: A decrypted flash drive containing data belonging to a certain "A.P.". Includes various technical files. The word "Unheard" appears intermittently in the code, but the code itself doesn’t function or run anything.
68e7d35483bb1cc4ac02d8c7 Description: A hard drive taken from A.P.’s car. Important data may still remain on it.
68e7d904aded99fd1a0624f2 Name: Reprogrammed keycard for A.P.'s apartment lock (Red)
68e7d904aded99fd1a0624f2 Description: A red TerraGroup Labs keycard reprogrammed using technical data from A.P.'s flash drive. In theory it might open a hidden room in A.P.'s apartment.
68e7d984308332889e0b5e71 Name: Reprogrammed keycard for A.P.'s apartment lock (Blue)
68e7d984308332889e0b5e71 Description: A blue TerraGroup Labs keycard reprogrammed using technical data from A.P.'s flash drive. In theory it might open a hidden room in A.P.'s apartment.
68e91494ad87d322fb0497f9 Description: A pack of .308 ME ammo, 20 rounds.
68e914c3a7bbc64c0702853f Description: A pack of .308 ME LOKT ammo, 20 rounds.
68e9156326fbff63b30106a0 Description: A pack of .50 BMG HP ammo, 10 rounds.
68e915b76ccca06412020902 Description: A pack of .50 BMG M21 ammo, 10 rounds.
68e915cf55ba5bd1c6083a32 Description: A pack of .50 BMG M33 ammo, 10 rounds.
68e915dfd996b7754e0f25c9 Name: .50 BMG M903 SLAP ammo pack (10 pcs)
68e915dfd996b7754e0f25c9 Description: A pack of .50 BMG M903 SLAP ammo, 10 rounds.
68e9176da7bbc64c07028543 Description: A pack of 7.62x25 mm ТТ M855A1 ammo, 25 rounds.
68e9179c553e40054d06dd15 Description: A pack of 7.62x25 mm ТТ M856A1 ammo, 25 rounds.
68e917b207e1c8aa3304b8c9 Description: A pack of 7.62x25 mm ТТ M995 ammo, 25 rounds.
68e95d71a3d110355b03e529 Description: A standard key, distinguished only by a Mechanic keychain. Seems Elektronik has a sense of humor. And a Tarko figurine supply channel.
68e95f4fa4a577e907015787 Description: It’s unclear which specific bunkhouse this key belongs to. But it should be somewhere on the Customs territory.
68e960db934bf7b02d005dab Description: A key to one of the apartments at Zmeisky Alley 3.
68e96180901b9b10270f1eed Description: A key to an apartment in an older building. It seems to have been taken during the victim’s torture to later access their apartment.
68e9654d72488961110dbf69 Description: A Federal State Reserve Agency base bunker technical storeroom key. Now all that remains is to find this storeroom.
68ea979d5e6784cb2f0b4e74 Description: A scrap of paper from some document or letter, containing only a single word.
68ea987a90ddcd52210da6bd Description: A note left by someone from the garrison at the port terminal.

68ea9b43b8469178710c158e Description: A note with orders for the cultists.
68eaddac9b384b24740f91de Description: An issue of the Tarkov Herald featuring an article about a local criminal authority.

68ee0125fdf770156c0da329 Description: A pack of 9.3x64mm SP ammo, 20 rounds.

Arena welcome screen description:
Bem-vindo à Arena!

É aqui que seu personagem, um operador de uma empresa militar privada (PMC), lutará contra outros jogadores por glória e dinheiro.

Devido ao caos do conflito, na cidade de Tarkov, região de Norvinsk, a lei e a ordem ficaram em segundo plano. Este é o local onde observadores ricos escolheram por organizar batalhas onde os PMCs lutarão entre si até o último sobrevivente ou trabalharão em equipe para completar um determinado objetivo – que, claro, será definido pelos Mestres.

Se você ainda não possui Escape From Tarkov, pode comprar o jogo e transferir todo o seu progresso da Arena para lá.
Se você já possui Escape From Tarkov, todo o progresso obtido na Arena (experiência e habilidades) também contará para o seu personagem no EFT e vice-versa - o progresso no EFT conta para a Arena.

Arena/Preset/Tooltip/Tab/Assault: Assalto é a classe mais versátil. As predefinições desta classe possuem equipamentos balanceados adequados para a maioria das situações de combate.
Arena/Preset/Tooltip/Tab/CQB: Enforcer é a classe com maior blindagem da Arena. Os Enforcers são caracterizados por seus escudos faciais e maior munição para suas armas principais. As predefinições desta classe são excelentes na defesa de posições e tiroteios prolongados.
Arena/Preset/Tooltip/Tab/Collection: Kits dados para conquistas especiais na Arena.
Arena/Preset/Tooltip/Tab/Marksman: Atirador é uma classe para combate de longo alcance. As predefinições desta classe geralmente possuem armas secundárias poderosas e proteção de armadura razoável. Esta classe altamente especializada é indispensável em Arenas ao ar livre.
Arena/Preset/Tooltip/Tab/Rating: As predefinições de raqueadas são distribuídas para atingir uma determinada classificação na Arena.
Arena/Preset/Tooltip/Tab/Scout: Batedor é uma classe para jogadores que preferem alto risco e alta recompensa. As predefinições desta classe são armadas principalmente com SMGs de cano curto com munição perfurante, mas a proteção fraca não dá espaço para um único erro.
Arena/Rematching: Retornando a busca de partida com alta prioridade
Arena/Rematching/NoServer: Devido a problemas técnicos, o servidor não pode ser encontrado. Retornando a busca de partida.

ArenaBattlePass/Inspector/RelatedTrading: Estará disponível para compra com Ref em Escape from Tarkov
ArenaBattlePass/Tutorial/Step1: Este é o seu nível do Passe de Batalha. Para cada nível conquistado, você ganha Pontos de Batalha, a moeda especial do Passe de Batalha. Para ganhar um nível, você precisa concluir tarefas operacionais e participar de batalhas de Arena em qualquer modo de jogo.
ArenaBattlePass/Tutorial/Step2: Esta é a moeda especial do BattlePass: Pontos de Batalha, usada para desbloquear recompensas. Você pode ganhar a moeda subindo de nível com seu BattlePass e concluindo tarefas operacionais.
ArenaBattlePass/Tutorial/Step3: Você também pode ganhar Pontos de Batalha trocando Rublos e Moedas GP. As ofertas de troca são atualizadas a cada 24 horas.
ArenaBattlePass/Tutorial/Step4: Para ganhar uma recompensa, você precisa ter o nível correspondente do Passe de Batalha e uma certa quantidade de Pontos de Batalha. As recompensas podem ter condições adicionais de desbloqueio. Por exemplo, desbloquear várias recompensas da página anterior ou concluir várias tarefas operacionais.
ArenaBattlePass/Tutorial/Step5: All BattlePass items, except for currency and crates, will remain with you after wipes. May fortune be with you on the sands of the Arena!
ArenaBattlePass/Tutorial/Welcome: Here you can track your BattlePass progress and earn new rewards.

ArmoryTutor/LevelsDescription:
Enquanto você luta na Arena, as suas armas sobem de nível.
Cada nível desbloqueia acessórios de arma que melhoram as estatísticas da arma.
ArmoryTutor/LevelsTipDescription: Não se esqueça de coletar suas recompensas de nível de arma.
ArmoryTutor/LinkedDescription:
A pesquisa vinculadas ajudam a explorar as ligações entre os itens.
Para as armas, são os acessórios, munições e carregadores, e para as armaduras, são as placas balísticas.
ArmoryTutor/LinkedTipDescription: Acessórios desbloqueados estão disponíveis em qualquer arma compatível.
ArmoryTutor/UnlockDescription:
Você pode comprar itens por rublos e GP Coins.
Para comprar alguns itens, você precisa cumprir condições especiais,
como completar missões diárias ou atingir um certo nível de perfil.
ArmoryTutor/UnlockTipDescription: GP coins podem ser ganhas ao completar missões operacionais dadas pelo Ref.

Custom/Description:
Jogo personalizado
Neste modo, você pode criar uma partida de acordo com suas próprias regras ou ingressar em uma sala existente.
O progresso feito neste modo de jogo não é salvo!
CustomPresetsTutor/ClassAssaultDescripti: Uma classe versátil que equilibra ataque e defesa
CustomPresetsTutor/ClassInfo:
Cada classe tem limites de metascore diferentes. Equipe sua predefinição com armas,
munição, armadura e suprimentos médicos para que cada uma das barras fique dentro da <color=#63CFAD>zona verde</color>.
CustomPresetsTutor/ClassScoutDescription: Uma classe ofensiva com acesso à munição perfurante e armas de disparo rápido

CustomPresetsTutor/ClassSqbDescription: Uma classe defensiva com grande variabilidade em coletes e capacetes

CustomPresetsTutor/ConsumeDescription: A barra de utilidades predefinida exibe a meta pontuação para medicina, vestes táticas e fones de ouvido.
CustomPresetsTutor/ConsumeTipDescription: Não esqueça de adicionar os consumíveis para o painel de acesso rápido.
CustomPresetsTutor/DefenceDescription:
A barra de defesa predefinida exibe a pontuação meta para todos os elementos de armadura e itens com propriedades de proteção.
Você pode trocar placas balísticas e adicionar ou remover acessórios de proteção extra dos capacetes.
CustomPresetsTutor/DefenceTipDescription: Você pode mudar as placas balísticas em armaduras corporais e porta-placas. Capacetes podem ser equipados com viseiras.
CustomPresetsTutor/FireDescription: A barra de poder de fogo predefinida exibe a pontuação meta para sua arma, munição e mods de arma.
CustomPresetsTutor/FireTipDescription: Não esqueça de inserir munição em seus carregadores.

CustomPresetsTutor/MPDescription: Pontuação Meta é uma classificação de desempenho universal para itens em EFT:Arena. Cada peça de equipamento tem sua própria pontuação meta.

e como construir os kits mais eficazes para suas partidas.

EAreaType/CircleOfCultists/Tooltip: Bônus do Círculo de Cultistas O valor de cada item sacrificado é somado. Esse total determina o valor dos itens recebidos como um Presente dos cultistas. Se o valor de um único sacrifício estiver acima de um certo limite, há uma chance de receber itens necessários para tarefas ativas e zonas de Esconderijo inacabadas. O valor dos Presentes é aumentado ainda mais pelos bônus. Os cultistas não podem entregar seus Presentes enquanto você estiver no Esconderijo. Bônus: — Sacrificar um Amuleto Sagrado aumenta o valor do Presente em {0}% — A habilidade de Gerenciamento de Esconderijo aumenta o bônus do Amuleto Sagrado
EAreaType/EquipmentPresetsStand/Tooltip:
O rack pode ser equipado com qualquer equipamento.

No menu de kits, você pode usar equipamentos de um dos manequins ou trocar os equipamentos já equipados pelo seu PMC pelos equipamentos do manequim.

Itens de bolsa e itens de slot especial não se aplicam a equipar e trocar.
EAreaType/PlaceOfFame/Tooltip: Ganhar bônus por dogtags PMC. Os bônus são concedidos para dogtags de jogadores PMC que são: - Da facção adversária; - Não está na sua lista de amigos; - Não estava no seu grupo na hora do assassinato. Cada nível de dogtag traz um {0}% bônus O bônus máximo para uma dogtag é {1}%

EFTFinal/Info:
Congratulations! You have successfully completed the final trial. The story has been recorded, and the world has returned to the state it was in before the events at the port terminal.

If you wish to see a different outcome, start again from a clean slate. To do this, you will need to fully reset your profile or obtain Prestige.

It has been a long and challenging journey. Thank you for seeing it through to the end with us.

Offline raid description:
Com a finalidade de reforçar as capacidades de testes, a versão Beta do jogo irá incluir um modo offline especial que permite aos jogadores entrar na incursão completamente sozinho (com ou sem Scavs).
Isso pode ser usado para exploração e teste do mapa, ajuste de armas, testes do personagem e outras atividades que sejam desejadas em caso dos servidores do jogo estarem lotados ou indisponíveis.

Todas as mecânicas de jogo no modo cooperativo (clima, bots, chefes, etc.) são idênticas às mecânicas online.

PlantLocationDescription: A propriedade industrial e as instalações da fábrica química # 16 foram alugadas ilegalmente para a empresa TerraGroup. Durante as Guerras Contratuais, esta fábrica foi alvo de inúmeros tiroteios entre os agentes do USEC e do BEAR que determinaram o controle sobre todo o distrito industrial de Tarkov. Com o tempo, as instalações da fábrica foram convertidas em abrigo para civis locais, Scavs, juntamente com os ocasionais operadores do USEC ou BEAR.

Bem-vindo ao modo de jogo PVE ZONE

Neste modo você pode experimentar o jogo completo com progressão persistente de personagem PvE sozinho ou com amigos, sem se preocupar em ser atacado por outros jogadores em uma invasão.

Todas as mecânicas são idênticas ao modo de jogo PVP ZONE.

Boa sorte!

Ranked/Description:
Jogo Ranqueado
Os jogos ranqueados incluem apenas modos equilibrados, o que permitirá que você se concentre nas partidas mais justas e interessantes para a futura liga cibernética.
As classificações que os jogadores ganham neste modo podem ser usadas para determinar os lutadores mais fortes do time. Algumas predefinições podem estar bloqueadas para o modo classificado. A mesma classificação será usada para matchmaking.

Runddans/LocationDescrition:
Para se tornar parte do Khorovod, você precisa usar uma braçadeira especial e estocar o combustível festivo especial.

Entre os habitantes locais, haverá muitos que querem arruinar a celebração, por isso a árvore de natal precisará de proteção.

O Khorovod estará completo assim que todas as árvores do Prapor estiverem acesas.

SMGDescription: A habilidade de manuseio da submetralhadora melhora o manuseio geral, reduz o recuo e o tempo de recarga deste tipo de arma.

Savage matchmaker: Começar incursão como um Scav, um bandido local com um conjunto de equipamentos aleatório. Tarkov é sua casa, você faz as regras!
SavageBannerDescription: Uma incursão como Scav é diferente de uma incursão com seu personagem principal. Player Scavs irão entrar em locais e tempos aleatórios durante a incursão. A saúde e equipamentos Scav também serão aleatórios. Extrair como Scav lhe dará a oportunidade de transferir qualquer saque obtido durante a incursão para o seu personagem principal. Morrer como Scav não afetará o seu progresso de maneira nenhuma.

SearchDescription: Habilidade de busca rápida e eficaz em corpos
SearchLevelingUpDescription: A habilidade Pesquisar é aprimorada pesquisando contêineres.
Select BEAR Character: Você é um operador do BEAR, uma Companhia Militar Privada (CMP) russa composta de ex-oficiais das forças especiais de todos os antigos países soviéticos. Os Bears lutavam nas guerras contratuais como representantes do governo russo para descobrir as atividades ilegais dos Laboratórios Grupo Terra e acabar com o contínuo conflito armado com o seu subcontratado de segurança, a CMP ocidental USEC.
Select USEC Character: Você é um operador USEC, um PMC estrangeiro, empregado pelo Terra Group Labs como um subcontratado de segurança. O principal objetivo dos USEC era destruir todas as evidências de qualquer atividade potencialmente ilícita de seu empregador e proteger sua propriedade de ser capturada pelos BEAR, os PMC contratados pelo governo russo para investigar as operações do Grupo Terra.

ShootOutDescription: Shootout - uma partida estilo torneio round-robin onde cada equipe joga contra as outras. As duas equipes com maior número de pontos de vitória se enfrentam na final, onde é determinado o vencedor.
ShootOutDuoDescription: Mini-torneio em partida única, onde equipes de dois competem entre si.
ShootOutTrioDescription: Mini-torneio em partida única, onde equipes de três competem entre si.
ShotgunLevelingUpDescription: A habilidade com a escopeta é melhorada ao disparar e recarregar o tipo de arma correspondente.
SilentOpsDescription: A habilidade de permanecer indetectável em todos os aspectos em incursão, melhor velocidade de combate corpo a corpo e volume de sons reduzido em procuras e ao abrir portas.
SniperDescription: A habilidade de manuseio do rifle de ferrolho melhora o manuseio geral, reduz o recuo e o tempo de recarga deste tipo de arma.
SniperLevelingUpDescription: A habilidade com armas dos rifles de ferrolho é melhorada ao disparar e recarregar o tipo de arma correspondente.
SnipingDescription: Habilidade de sniper reduz o recuo quando mirando, especialmente quando deitado, e permite que segure o fôlego por mais tempo.
Softstop/You will be counted as a surviv: O servidor irá parar. Quando ocorrer você terá o status "Sobreviveu" na incursão

Erro ao transferir itens. Por favor transfira os itens manualmente.
SplashDescription: Escape from Tarkov modela e simula armas, acessórios e outros equipamentos do mundo real. Os nomes dos produtos, das marcas retratadas ou referidas no jogo ou nos seus materiais auxiliares são de propriedade dos seus respectivos donos. Os proprietários dessas marcas, os fabricantes de armas, equipamentos e acessórios usados no jogo não são filiados com os produtores de Escape from Tarkov e não endossam ou patrocinam o jogo.
SplashHeader: 2023 Battlestate Games a.s. Escape from Tarkov e Battlestate Games são marcas registradas de Battlestate Games LIMITED a.s. Todos os direitos reservados.
StrengthBuffAim: Reduz o consumo de estamina enquanto mira em [{0:0.#%}]
StrengthBuffElite: Armas equipadas não somam ao peso de seu personagem (exceto armas em mochilas)

StrengthBuffLiftWeightInc: Aumenta capacidade de carregar peso em [{0:0.#%}]

StrengthBuffMeleePowerInc: Aumenta o poder de dano corpo a corpo em [{0:0.#%}]
StrengthBuffSprintSpeedInc: Aumenta a velocidade do movimento e corrida em [{0:0.#%}]
StrengthBuffThrowDistanceInc: Aumenta a distancia de arremesso em [{0:0.#%}]
StrengthDescription: O aumento da força permite que você pule mais alto, corra mais rápido, bata com mais força, arremesse mais longe e carregue mais peso.
StrengthLevelingUpDescription: A habilidade de Força é melhorada ao se mover com o efeito de status de sobrepeso, lançando granadas, usando armas corpo a corpo e ao se exercitar na academia do Esconderijo.
StressPainChance: Reduz a chance de dor intensa em [{0:0.#%}]
StressResistanceDescription: Resistência ao estresse aumenta as chances de resistir ao choque da lesão, apertar as mãos e tremores.
StressResistanceLevelingUpDescription: A habilidade de Resistência ao Estresse é melhorada ao receber dano. Ter o efeito de status de Dor sem usar analgésicos também melhora esta habilidade.
StressTremor: Reduz a oscilação de tremor em [{0:0.#%}]
Subtitles/keeper_dialog_option_who_are_y: [{"s":0,"e":3,"t":"Quem eu sou não é importante no momento."},{"s":3.1,"e":5,"t":"O que importa é quem você é e por que você está aqui."}]

[{"s":0,"e":6,"t":"Eu sou o Lightkeeper. Cuido de tudo e de todos, e todos podem ver minha luz."},{"s":6.1,"e":12,"t":"Em nosso tempo inquieto, é fundamental ter as informações necessárias."},{"s":12.1,"e":18,"t":"Informações criam conexões, conexões geram oportunidades."}]

[{"s":0,"e":6,"t":"Sim. A oportunidade de mudar o ambiente e, consequentemente, a realidade."},{"s":6.1,"e":10,"t":"Neste tipo de ambiente, a necessidade básica do ser humano é a sobrevivência."},{"s":10.1,"e":15,"t":"Não quero simplesmente sobreviver, eu quero controlar a sobrevivência."}]

[{"s":0,"e":6,"t":"Sim, para o sobrevivente. Para quem garante a sobrevivência, tudo é diferente."},{"s":6.1,"e":14,"t":"Nós nos conhecemos por um motivo. Todos os eventos têm um significado, não há acidentes."}]
[{"s":0,"e":4,"t":"Mas era você quem estava me procurando, não era? Você se perguntou por quê?"}]
[{"s":0,"e":4,"t":"Estar perto daquele para quem o colapso é o começo do novo."},{"s":6.1,"e":10,"t":"Você não quer simplesmente sobreviver, você quer estar no controle."}]
[{"s":0,"e":8,"t":"Tarkov is who you are. You cannot escape from yourself. Just as I could not escape from myself."}]

[{"s":0,"e":14,"t":"Este mundo está acabando, todas essas tentativas patéticas de segurar um bloco de gelo derretendo no meio de um oceano furioso - todas essas lutas locais, o hipocrisia dos comerciantes, a instigação, a violência multiplicada pela violência."},{"s":14.1,"e":22,"t":"Tudo isso leva a um resultado muito específico. será o renascimento."}]
[{"s":0,"e":5,"t":"Você não entende, mas isso é natural."},{"s":5.1,"e":10,"t": "Eu também não entendi no começo, quando eles me procuraram."}]
[{"s":0,"e":6,"t":"Não há mais nada para conversarmos. Com o tempo, você descobrirá por si mesmo, enquanto desvenda o emaranhado."}]
Subtitles/keeper_end_of_time_03: [{"s":0,"e":1,"t":"O relógio está correndo. O tempo está quase acabando."}]
Subtitles/keeper_end_of_time_farewell_01: [{"s":0,"e":2,"t":"O tempo acabou. A porta é por aqui."}]
Subtitles/keeper_end_of_time_farewell_04: [{"s":0,"e":2,"t":"Por favor, deixe o local. O tempo acabou."}]
Subtitles/keeper_first_greeting_01: [{"s":3,"e":10,"t":"É você? Certo, quem mais seria. Então, você passou em todos os meus testes?"},{"s":10.1,"e":18,"t":"Eu sou o Lightkeeper. Acho que você já ouviu falar de mim. Todo mundo quer fazer negócios comigo, mas nem todos podem."}]
Subtitles/keeper_generic_farewell_03: [{"s":0,"e":1,"t":"É tudo por enquanto. Tenha um bom dia."}]
Subtitles/keeper_generic_farewell_05: [{"s":0,"e":2,"t":"Eu estarei aqui se você precisar de algo."}]
Subtitles/keeper_generic_farewell_06: [{"s":0,"e":1,"t":"Passe aqui quando você tiver um tempo."}]
Subtitles/keeper_generic_farewell_07: [{"s":0,"e":2,"t":"Boa sorte. Só não deixe o Zryachiy bravo"}]
Subtitles/keeper_generic_greetings_08: [{"s":0,"e":1,"t":"Já que você está aqui, pode falar."}]
Subtitles/keeper_outdoor_player_death_01: [{"s":0,"e":4,"t":"Zryachiy, que tiros são esses? É isso, acabamos, saia daqui!"}]
Subtitles/keeper_outdoor_player_death_02: [{"s":0,"e":4,"t":"Assuma as posições Zryachiy! Você, saia, agora!"}]
Subtitles/keeper_outdoor_player_death_03: [{"s":0,"e":4,"t":"Zryachiy, entre. Lide com isso! O encontro acabou, saia, agora!"}]
Subtitles/keeper_sniper_death_01: [{"s":0,"e":4,"t":"Zryachiy, na escuta? Zryachiy! Certo, você saia daqui, agora!"}]
Subtitles/keeper_sniper_death_02: [{"s":0,"e":5,"t":"Zryachiy, aqui é o Lightkeeper! Zryachiy, venha aqui! É isso, nosso encontro acabou, saia daqui!"}]
Subtitles/keeper_sniper_death_03: [{"s":0,"e":4,"t":"Oque está acontecendo, Zryachiy? Me responda! Terminamos. Fora!"}]
Subtitles/keeper_want_work_reaction_02: [{"s":0,"e":2,"t":"Nós acabamos de se conhecer. Eventualmente, a hora vai chegar."}]
Subtitles/keeper_want_work_reaction_03: [{"s":0,"e":3,"t":"Estou trabalhando em algo. Não se precipite."}]
Subtitles/keeper_want_work_reaction_04: [{"s":0,"e":2,"t":"A qualquer hora agora. Eu vou deixar você saber quando."}]
SurgeryDescription: A habilidade de realizar cirurgias em campo de batalha pode salvar sua vida em situações críticas. Quanto mais você aprimorar essa habilidade, melhor e mais rápido você irá realizar essas operações.
SurgeryLevelingUpDescription: A habilidade Cirurgia é aprimorada com o uso de kits cirúrgicos em partes do corpo feridas.
SurgeryReducePenalty: Reduz a penalidade de vida em cirurgia em [{0:0.#%}]
SurgerySpeed: Aumenta a velocidade de cirurgia em [{0:0.#%}]

TapesText/sound_info_recorder_tape_couri:
<color=#515352>Answering Machine:</color>
Hello, you have reached the Rus Post courier service. All operators are busy right now. Please leave a message after the tone.

<color=#515352>Courier:</color>
This is Courier Odintsov. Personal number 22909. I was supposed to deliver urgent mail to Norvinsk, but the roads are fu- busy, so I’m going to be delayed.

<color=#515352>Answering Machine:</color>
Hello, you have reached the Rus Post courier service. All operators are busy right now. Please leave a message after the tone.

<color=#515352>Courier:</color>
This is Courier Odintsov. Personal number 22909. Things are way worse than I thought. Half the roads are blocked. I have no idea if I’ll make it out of Tarkov today. Let the recipient know not to hang up on the call center.

<color=#515352>Answering Machine:</color>
Hello, you have reached the Rus Post courier service. All operators are busy right now. Please leave a message after the tone.

<color=#515352>Courier:</color>
This is a complete clusterfuck! They're stopping everyone at the checkpoint, the line's already kilometers long. The truck driver in front of me started arguing with them, and they fucking shot him! Are you fucking hearing this?! A stray bullet hit my car! I almost fucking died!

<color=#515352>Courier:</color>
You know what, I don't get paid for this. I’m getting outta here on foot to my family. I’m leaving the car, all the parcels are inside. Life’s more important. If you send someone — the key… the key is under the wheel.
TapesText/sound_info_recorder_tape_culti:
<color=#515352>Priest:</color>
The new masters of the world are already here, and the process has begun… The New World has started to take shape, and the Wardens have already been chosen.

<color=#515352>Priest:</color>
Know that the Eye of the World has been watching you for a long time, and all… all your deeds are imprinted in the memory that the Wardens will carry from the old world into the new. Soon, it will be the only thing of value.

<color=#515352>Priest:</color>
I knew you would come here. It was all foretold. We awaited the Blind One who would help us prepare everything for the Riders of the Arrival. And in you… we found him.

<color=#515352>Priest:</color>
Behold the power of The Unheard before it is too late…
TapesText/sound_info_recorder_tape_igor_:
<color=#515352>Cult Victim:</color>
Tape #1. Time is… time is 14:09. My name’s Igor. I feel like some secret agent doing this. I even had to switch to analog recordings. You know, with a tape recorder. At least that way any of those freaks can’t hack it.

<color=#515352>Cult Victim:</color>
Yesterday someone slipped a book under my door. Creepy as hell, covered in those same symbols that started showing up around the city…  At first I thought it was some prank. Like, you know, that old TV show, Naked and Funny. Damn, that one sure is an oldie…

<color=#515352>Cult Victim:</color>
Anyway, the book! I read it. Spent the whole evening on it. And it’s full of… of some serious weirdness. Not nonsense, no. More like… I don’t know, like someone knows things they really shouldn’t know.

<color=#515352>Cult Victim:</color>
Well, our Cobalt is connected to TerraGroup, and over the years I’ve learned a few things. So these… these "Gifts" mentioned in the book sound an awful lot like some of TerraGroup’s projects. The secret type.

<color=#515352>Cult Victim:</color>
I’m sure they tried to recruit me. Like, into some cult. Only these guys are way more sophisticated than your average Peoples Temple types. They think I have access to some "Eye of the World". That’s why they need me. And they’re not gonna stop at just sending a book.

<color=#515352>Cult Victim:</color>
I have to run. Yes… yes, I need to disappear. Lay low, maybe even in Bruges.

<color=#515352>Cult Victim:</color>
They’ve been watching me. This whole time. And I thought it was just paranoia. Even talked about it with my therapist, for fuck’s sake! I should’ve trusted my gut. Maybe I wouldn’t have to drop everything and run now. I…

<color=#515352>Cult Victim:</color>
The last tape ran out. I didn’t think it would happen this fast. Alright, I’ll make this quick.

<color=#515352>Cult Victim:</color>
Anyway, those guys… those guys in hoods… They’re watching me. I just found a note stuck in my door. You know, between the door and the frame—whatever! It said something about the "Eye of the World", that I look through it and it looks back at me… The Priests called me the chosen one!

<color=#515352>Cult Victim:</color>
I need to run. I’m recording this on my way to the train station. I have to get out of here, doesn’t matter where or how anymore!
TapesText/sound_info_recorder_tape_labyr:
<color=#515352>TerraGroup Scientist:</color>
This is Nikolay Voronenko speaking. The Labyrinth is the worst technically equipped TerraGroup facility, we have already lost contact with headquarters. Perhaps one of the test subjects cut the cable…

<color=#515352>TerraGroup Scientist:</color>
The facility was stormed by BEAR mercenaries. To defend the Labyrinth I had to release the test subjects from groups 3 and 12. Judging by the sounds, only the test subjects are left outside now, I can’t hear any of the BEARs.

<color=#515352>TerraGroup Scientist:</color>
The experiments carried out in the Labyrinth are too important and too dangerous to lose the results. So I gathered all the facility documentation into a folder and sent it to the stock.

<color=#515352>TerraGroup Scientist:</color>
I don’t know if I’ll make it to the evacuation point… but during the chase I managed to grab a pistol from one of the BEARs. It will be a last resort.
TapesText/sound_info_recorder_tape_morem:
<color=#515352>Moreman:</color>
…He's like a mother duck!

<color=#515352>Taran:</color>
Explain.

<color=#515352>Moreman:</color>
You don’t get it, Taran? Like a fucking mother duck! Remember how… how Voevoda got us out of the line of fire last time. Made us all walk outta there in a straight line like some ducklings. Fucking… heh…

<color=#515352>Taran:</color>
Yeah, I remember. No one got hurt, at least. And the job was done.

<color=#515352>Moreman:</color>
Well I’m not saying it’s a bad thing! Who do you take me for? Our commander is like a real batya to me.

<color=#515352>Voevoda:</color>
What are we up to here, pups?

<color=#515352>Moreman:</color>
Comrade commander, everything here is strictly by the book! Come join us!

<color=#515352>Voevoda:</color>
No thanks. Alright, get ready, we’re heading out soon.

<color=#515352>Moreman:</color>
Aye, commander!

<color=#515352>Moreman:</color>
I hope this comes through. I don’t know if we’ll make it, so I’m leaving this recording.

<color=#515352>Moreman:</color>
When we were getting to the fallback point, Yastreb totally fucking snapped and started shooting at us! We put him down fast, but we walked into an ambush: shitheads came at us from every direction. Fuck. Guess the shooting… the shooting was… was a signal, damn it. Fuck. Motherfucking traitor…

<color=#515352>Moreman:</color>
We're still operational, but we got hit hard. Requesting help. Listen guys, I don’t hold it against-
TapesText/sound_info_recorder_tape_start:
<color=#515352>USEC Operative:</color>
Commander! How much longer do you reckon we'll be stuck here?

<color=#515352>USEC Squad Leader:</color>
For as long as they tell us to. TerraGroup still has a fuckload of unclosed facilities in Tarkov.

<color=#515352>USEC Operative:</color>
You think they’ll manage to pull everything out on time? Even with their resources, it sounds impossible.

<color=#515352>USEC Squad Leader:</color>
Let them set their priorities themselves. We’ve already got our hands full babysitting HVIs and hauling out TerraGroup’s docs. 

<color=#515352>USEC Operative:</color>
But still, even if everything is moved out, there will be hundreds of digital drives left behind… There’s no way to evacuate something like that in war conditions.

<color=#515352>USEC Squad Leader:</color>
They're not gonna extract everything, okay? I heard TerraGroup has some kind of weapon that wipes data from the systems. All of it.

<color=#515352>USEC Operative:</color>
Like an EMP? Surely they’re gonna give us a heads-up, right? It would screw all our coordination.

<color=#515352>USEC Squad Leader:</color>
Why would they hide this from us? Even if they do end up using this thing, it'll only be after we're evacuated. Without our PMC support, they wouldn't last long — they have no one but us.

<color=#515352>USEC Operative:</color>
What about those “contractors” we transferred the HVIs to? They looked quite serious. No, shady too. No insignias, no patches… Who are they anyway?

<color=#515352>USEC Squad Leader:</color>
There is no info on them from the HQ, so clearly we shouldn't get involved in that shit. They might be linked to that specialist guy over at the lighthouse. Or perhaps they're just an escort crew from outside the border — our guys are stretched thin here. Either way, we can't trust them.

<color=#515352>USEC Operative:</color>
Makes you wonder how fast TerraGroup would’ve been screwed up without us involved… Especially now, when even some of our own commanders are straying away from their orders…

<color=#515352>USEC Squad Leader:</color>
Listen, watch your mouth! Any other situation, and I'd have you deployed somewhere far worse! So shut up. SHUT UP!

<color=#515352>USEC Operative:</color>
Uh, yes sir!

<color=#515352>Squad Leader:</color>
To all BEAR survivors! The explosion knocked out all our electronics, I repeat, our comms are out! Operation is canceled! Fall back to the evacuation points on your own! Move with caution. Code phrase - "water is wet"!

<color=#515352>Squad Leader:</color>
To all USEC units! Blast killed all our electronics — no comm with the HQ. We’ve lost control of the facility. Evacuate through Exfil Three towards the port… Exfil Three! Expect enemy contact, proceed with caution. Any non-USEC individuals are to be considered hostile! Defend yourselves. Use sound judgment.
TapesText/sound_info_recorder_tape_tgmee:
<color=#515352>A.P.:</color>
Friends! Who’s still out there? Dmitry Sergeevich, come in and close the door, please. Thank you. Are all departments represented? I see they are. Let us begin, then.

<color=#515352>A.P.:</color>
By now, everyone’s noticed that communications have been down since this morning and many divisions are in lockdown. I’d like to say this is just another drill, but this time it’s very serious. We received an order from New York today. We’re evacuating.

<color=#515352>A.P.:</color>
Quiet, colleagues! I understand your concern, but we have to stay focused. I initiated the protocol a few hours ago. The specialists are already working on data destruction and sealing the premises. 

<color=#515352>A.P..:</color>
All projects in Tarkov are being shut down, including affiliated enterprises. From now on, contact with them will be handled only through… hmm… Gennady Viktorovich, I don’t see you, raise your hand, please. There, that’s the man you’ll need. I believe there shouldn’t be any issues. Those drills we ran weren’t for nothing…

<color=#515352>Question from the audience:</color>
Half of my samples aren’t ready yet. What’s going to happen to them?

<color=#515352>A.P.:</color>
Pyotr Alekseevich, please, hold your questions…

<color=#515352>Question from the audience:</color>
Excuse me, what about the large equipment?

<color=#515352>A.P.:</color>
The centrifuge has already been disassembled, literally an hour ago. Enough! Time is precious right now!

<color=#515352>A.P.:</color>
You’ll be able to ask your questions at the end, but for now, let’s stay on topic. Key personnel will be evacuated to the Health Resort — many of you have already vacationed there before. It’s now being used as an interim evacuation site. Logistics, escort, and security are handled by United Security personnel.

<color=#515352>A.P.:</color>
But be careful! Our cooperation with them ends immediately after arrival at the Health Resort! After that point, a new contractor will make contact, and management strongly advises against approaching USEC operatives.

<color=#515352>A.P.:</color>
I understand your concerns! I don’t have all the information myself, but I’m confident that our new partners will be just as reliable as USEC personnel. TerraGroup has always prioritized security and will entrust our evacuation only to true professionals.

<color=#515352>A.P.:</color>
Speaking of the evacuation… In 13 hours and 47 minutes, all TerraGroup facilities must be vacated. Yes, this is the first time we’re working under such a rush, but there’s no other way.

<color=#515352>A.P.:</color>
I’ve received the codes, "Braun" and "Chernigov" included… Also from Lisbon. So by the time the timer runs out, no one should be left here! I’ll be evacuating last. Well, not just me. Korneev, are you here?

<color=#515352>Korneev:</color>
Yes.

<color=#515352>A.P.:</color>
Good. Once everything is sealed, we’ll head to the Health Resort.

<color=#515352>A.P.:</color>
I understand, colleagues. It’s hard to realize that all production must be shut down. We won’t be able to take microbiology at all, just the data and parameters…

<color=#515352>Shout from the audience:</color>
How are we supposed to leave all this? We spent a year setting up the lab!

<color=#515352>A.P.:</color>
Galina Petrovna, calm down! Everything will be fine at the new location.

<color=#515352>A.P.:</color>
Alright, one more thing, this is important! Ahem, excuse me, I have to take this…

<color=#515352>A.P.:</color>
Hello? Yes, "Schliss 14"… Already… Yes… Wait, right now? Understood… Give me two minutes, I’ll find a spot.

<color=#515352>A.P.:</color>
Friends! It's an extremely urgent call, I need to step away. My apologies. I’ll be back soon.
TapesText/sound_info_recorder_tape_voevo:
<color=#515352>Voevoda:</color>
To the commander of the Gnezdo base. Reporting. After the combat task was completed, someone detonated an explosive. We have casualties among USEC operators and civilians. One of ours is critically wounded, the rest have light injuries. Assistance required. I repeat, assistance required!

<color=#515352>Voevoda:</color>
Ahem… I never kept a diary. Thought it was a stupid idea. But now I feel like I should share my thoughts with someone.

<color=#515352>Voevoda:</color>
The Bogatyrs got into a bad mess. Some of my boys are dead, others wounded. Maybe that is why I keep thinking this is not an accident.

<color=#515352>Voevoda:</color>
This is not only happening here. Tarkov, conflicts in the Middle East, hunger, poverty, global warming…

<color=#515352>Voevoda:</color>
People seem to be going mad! But strangely, it’s very sudden. A decent family man turns and shoots his little girls. It's the same here. Tarkov used to be a prosperous city. People came here on purpose. Then… the sore burst and it spilled out…

<color=#515352>Voevoda:</color>
What if it’s the Earth itself trying to rid itself of the filth, this humanity virus? People only harm this planet. Maybe this is the end for all of us?

<color=#515352>Voevoda:</color>
I do not know. But those thoughts just keep coming. End transmission.
TapesText/sound_info_recorder_tape_witne:
<color=#515352>Deputy Minister Shkurenko:</color>
…so. There are no exact dates yet. We think everything will start in about… three months. You and your, um, team should move in right after our signal.

<color=#515352>Chepyga:</color>
And the cops? I’m not sending my boys to their deaths for nothing.

<color=#515352>Deputy Minister Shkurenko:</color>
The mayor is aware and will take care of it. The pay is good, considering all your risks. Sponsors pay in foreign currency, just the way we like it.

<color=#515352>Chepyga:</color>
So the old scheme, then?

<color=#515352>Deputy Minister Shkurenko:</color>
Only this time you'll be able to take control of the whole city. Once the dust settles, obviously.

<color=#515352>Chepyga:</color>
Shit's getting serious. There'll be a lots of bodies.

<color=#515352>Deputy Minister Shkurenko:</color>
There will be a lot of blood spilled, but not yours and not ours, assuming we act together. Equipment, weapons, medical supplies — everything will be provided. Your tasks are tough, we won’t leave you without support.

<color=#515352>Chepyga:</color>
We’ll need more people. And waste a couple of local big shots beforehand so they don’t start nosing around. It’ll be harder if we don't do it soon enough.

<color=#515352>Deputy Minister Shkurenko:</color>
If you handle it cleanly, I’ll help cover it up. After things heat up, we won’t have trouble finding volunteers.

<color=#515352>Chepyga:</color>
Aight. When do we get the guns?

<color=#515352>Shkurenko's assitant:</color>
Yaroslav Grigoryevich, look…

<color=#515352>Chepyga:</color>
Hey you! The fuck you doing here?! Come here!

Trading/Btr/Dialog/AvailableServices/Des: Posso levá-lo aonde você quer ir, posso fornecer fogo de cobertura se você estiver sendo seguido. Também posso mover suas coisas para o lugar certo, para o seu esconderijo. Então, o que vai ser?
Trading/Dialog/AvailableServices: Você pode me ajudar com uma coisa?
Trading/Dialog/AvailableServices/Descrip: Quer meus serviços? Bem, você já cumpriu seu propósito, então vou ajudá-lo – se você puder me pagar.
Trading/Dialog/AvaliableServices: Você pode me ajudar com uma coisa?
Trading/Dialog/Btr/News1: Alguns babacas saquearam meu depósito! Consegui ficar de fora, mas a situação continua uma merda! Tenho que tirá-los de lá... Mas primeiro, preciso de um novo lugar para me estabelecer. Depois, vou procurar alguém que possa ajudar. Qualquer coisa que surgir, entro em contato com você, ok?
Trading/Dialog/Btr/News2: As notícias? Você viu como ficou quente de repente? Calor é uma coisa ótima, mas você não pode baixar a guarda! Tem que estar sempre alerta.
Trading/Dialog/Btr/News3: Ouvi dizer que alguns mercenários invadiram as antigas plantas industriais na alfândega. Correndo por aí, saqueando cada maldito canto. Sabe, eu estava me perguntando por que eles não abriram aquelas portas e portões antes. Eles ao menos tentaram?
Trading/Dialog/Btr/News4: Alguém decidiu contar todos os veteranos em Tarkov. Se você está aqui há muito tempo, provavelmente também pode ganhar alguma insígnia distintiva. De agora em diante, todos os calouros saberão quem tem mais coragem por aqui!
Trading/Dialog/Btr/News5: Tem lama por todo lado! Felizmente, esse garotinho é bem grande, ele não vai ficar atolado. Exceto toda a louça para lavar depois! Falando nisso, talvez você queira um emprego de meio período, lavando meu BTR? Não? Que merda.
Trading/Dialog/Btr/NoNews: Eu acho que estas são todas as informações que eu tenho.
Trading/Dialog/BtrBotCover/Description: Enquanto você estiver no BTR, atiraremos em qualquer um que colocar o nariz para fora. Também limparemos a zona de desembarque e daremos cobertura enquanto você sair, mas não por muito tempo.
Trading/Dialog/CultistAmulet/Description: Posso lhe oferecer um amuleto especial que o manterá protegido dos cultistas por algum tempo. Apenas certifique-se de não incomodá-los.
Trading/Dialog/CultistAmulet/Name: Você pode fazer com que esses caras de preto pararem de me atacar ao me verem?
Trading/Dialog/CultistsAid/Description: Posso lhe oferecer um amuleto especial que o manterá protegido por eles por algum tempo. Apenas certifique-se de não incomodá-los.
Trading/Dialog/CultistsAid/Name: Você pode fazer com que esses caras de preto pararem de me atacar ao me verem?
Trading/Dialog/ExUsecLoyalty/Description: Os Rogues podem te ajudar a sair daqui vivo. Mas você tem o dinheiro?
Trading/Dialog/ExUsecLoyalty/Name: Você pode me ajudar a negociar com os Rogues?
Trading/Dialog/PlayerTaxi/Description: Aqui é onde eu posso te deixar. Escolha um.
Trading/Dialog/PlayerTaxi/TarkovStreets/: Tudo bem, destino - cinema Rodina. Preço ok para você?
Dirigindo para o bonde. Você tem o dinheiro, certo?
Ótimo, estamos a caminho do centro da cidade. Você tem dinheiro suficiente?
Vou dirigir até o guindaste destruído. Você está bem com o valor?
Vou levá-lo ao antigo posto de controle do Scav. O preço está bom, certo?
Vou levá-lo ao hotel Pinewood. Como está o preço, tudo satisfatório?
Trading/Dialog/PlayerTaxi/Woods/p1/Descr: Vou para o bunker Scav. Preço bom?
Trading/Dialog/PlayerTaxi/Woods/p2/Descr: A vila submersa, hein? Acho que podemos conseguir. Aqui está o preço.
Trading/Dialog/PlayerTaxi/Woods/p3/Descr: Posso te levar até a bifurcação na estrada, claro. Você tem dinheiro suficiente?
Trading/Dialog/PlayerTaxi/Woods/p4/Descr: Serraria? Sem problemas! Aqui meu preço.
Trading/Dialog/PlayerTaxi/Woods/p5/Descr: Para o posto de controle da USEC, tudo bem. Mas não dirijo de graça.
Trading/Dialog/PlayerTaxi/Woods/p6/Descr: Estou traçando a rota para a base da Emercom. O preço está bom para você?
Trading/Dialog/PlayerTaxi/Woods/p7/Descr: Belezinha, será na serraria velha então. Aqui o valor.
Trading/Dialog/PlayerTaxi/Woods/p8/Descr: Você quer que eu te deixe no depósito? Só para você saber, você não pode sair de lá sem mim. Se o preço estiver bom, você fica de olho no tempo lá, tá bom?
Trading/Dialog/PlayerTaxi/p1/Description: Alright, destination - Rodina cinema. Price okay for you?
Trading/Dialog/PlayerTaxi/p2/Description: Driving to the tram. You got the cash, right?
Trading/Dialog/PlayerTaxi/p3/Description: Great, we're on course for city center. You got enough cash?
Trading/Dialog/PlayerTaxi/p4/Description: Gonna drive to the collapsed crane. You okay with the price?
Trading/Dialog/PlayerTaxi/p5/Description: I'll take you to the old Scav checkpoint. Price is fine, yeah?
Trading/Dialog/PlayerTaxi/p6/Description: I'll drive you over to the Pinewood hotel. How's the price, all satisfactory?
Trading/Dialog/ServicePayoff{0}: Ta certo, isso deve ser suficiente. (entregue "{0}")
Trading/Dialog/WhoAreYouPlayerQuestion10: Eles? De quem você está falando?
Trading/Dialog/WhoAreYouPlayerQuestion4: Então, por que você precisa de mim?
Trading/Dialog/WhoAreYouPlayerQuestion5: Não sei... Achei que conhecer alguém como você poderia me dar alguma coisa.
Trading/Dialog/WhoAreYouPlayerQuestion8: Renascimento? Eclipse? Que diabos você está falando?
Trading/Dialog/WhoAreYouPlayerQuestion9: Bem, eu vou tentar. E eu esperava que você me ajudasse com isso.
Trading/Dialog/ZryachiyAid/Description: Zryachiy é um dos melhores atiradores de elite do mundo. Ele vai te proteger, matar qualquer um que cruzar seu caminho. Mas esse tipo de ajuda tem um preço. Você está pronto para desembolsar?
Trading/Dialog/ZryachiyAid/Name: Ei, seu atirador pode me ajudar a sair deste lugar vivo?
